short_summary: CREATE METAL DESIGNS FOR LOG LIFTERS
description: CREATE METAL ASSEMBLIES, DRAWINGS FOR LOGS CASES
full_summary:
# 5P135-230016 Metal fabrication and drawing creation for Log lifters

## Tender Notice
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4151557459
*   **Publication Date:** August 17, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 20, 2023, 14:00:00 EDT
*   **Provisional Sect:**
    *   Provision: Cancelled
    *   Reason: None

### Procurement Details

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Limited Tendering Reason:** None

### Technical Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified companies specializing in metal fabrication and creation of drawings for log lifters. Bidders must submit the required supporting documentation and bids by 14:00 EDT on September 21, 2023. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entities Name:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)
*   **End User Entities Address:** 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3, Canada
*   **Contact Person Name:** Stanley Chui
*   **Contact Person Email:** stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements

*   The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Tender Documents

*   The tender notice and procurement documents can be found at the following URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17193901?extsite=MTcxOTM5MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
